trans-unit.source: If you haven't already done so, sign in to the [Azure portal](http://manage.windowsazure.com).
trans-unit.target: If you haven't already done so, sign in to the [Azure portal](http://manage.windowsazure.com).

trans-unit.source: Click **Virtual Machines**, and then select the appropriate virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: Click **Virtual Machines**, and then select the appropriate virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: Log on to the virtual machine
trans-unit.target: Log on to the virtual machine

trans-unit.source: Click **Open** to use the Remote Desktop Protocol file that's automatically created for the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: Click **Open** to use the Remote Desktop Protocol file that's automatically created for the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: Type the credentials for the administrative account on the virtual machine, and then click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Type the credentials for the administrative account on the virtual machine, and then click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.TIP] In most cases, you'll use the user name and password that was specified when the virtual machine was created.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.TIP] In most cases, you'll use the user name and password that was specified when the virtual machine was created.

trans-unit.source: Check the user name to make sure it has the correct domain information:
trans-unit.target: Check the user name to make sure it has the correct domain information:

trans-unit.source: If the VM belongs to a domain at your organization, make sure the user name includes the name of that domain.
trans-unit.target: If the VM belongs to a domain at your organization, make sure the user name includes the name of that domain.

trans-unit.source: If the VM doesn't belong to a domain, either remove any domain information by starting the line with '\' or use the VM name as the domain name.
trans-unit.target: If the VM doesn't belong to a domain, either remove any domain information by starting the line with '\' or use the VM name as the domain name.

trans-unit.source: If the VM is a domain controller, type the user name and password of a domain administrator account for that domain.
trans-unit.target: If the VM is a domain controller, type the user name and password of a domain administrator account for that domain.

trans-unit.source: Click **Yes** to verify the identity of the virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: Click **Yes** to verify the identity of the virtual machine.

trans-unit.source: Verify the identity of the machine
trans-unit.target: Verify the identity of the machine

trans-unit.source: You can now work with the virtual machine remotely.
trans-unit.target: You can now work with the virtual machine remotely.
